meta.name: author
meta.content: Ryan Yap, Wong Kah Heng, Joel Yong, Wong Jun Jie

ol.li:
Description
Fine, flamed maple and even-grained spruce are hand carved and graduated to ensure a sweet, sympathetic tone with plenty of carrying power. The thin, transparent varnish is of highest quality, and the strings are genuine Thomastik Dominants. This outfit comes complete with a genuine horsehair bow, a hardshell case and violin care products. The SV-600 is a step-up instrument. The appropriate violin having the best tone quality and looks for the advanced student, the SV-600 features a tighter grain in the spruce top, which results in a richer and more complex tone. The pegs and tailpiece are of a better quality and the maple in the neck is beautifully flamed and finished. It is a great-looking, great-sounding, great-playing instrument that will provide many years of reliable service.

Specifications
Name: Cremona SV-600
Size: 4/4
Top: Choice solid wood
Back and Sides: Well-figured solid maple
Finish: Light orange varnish
Neck: Solid figured maple, unfinished in playing area
Fingerboard: Premium ebony
Bow: Quality deluxe brazilwood with horsehair
Bridge: Aubert aged maple
Case: Lightweight oblong rigid foam with four bow holders and hygrometer
Chin Rest: Guarneri-style
Pricing: RM100 per month

Pricing Explanation
Being a more popular instrument in the world of music partitioning, the SV-600 is priced at only RM100 per month on rental, despite its fee of USD530, or RM2168. This instrument is perfect for those who would rent for practice and to some extent, even exams and performances.

Disclaimer
When in possession of the instrument, the user holds full responsibility for what happens to the instrument. If the instrument rented is in anyway damaged, the customer will have to replace said instrument for the rental service. Late returners of the instrument would be issued a warning in a week, and will be subjegated to a RM150 late fee. For every subsequent week, another RM150 would be added.

div.p: Rentone is a small music renting company that rents high quality instruments for the most reasonable of prices!
Rentone has instruments ranging from performance class trumpets to classic guitars, rent an instrument today!
